Question: How to update the listview for the new message in android for the chat application:
Answer: To update the ListView for the new message, you need to add the new message to the list and then call notifyDataSetChanged() on your adapter. This will refresh the ListView with the new data.

```java
// Add the new message to the list
list.add(newMessage);

// Notify the adapter about the data change
adapter.notifyDataSetChanged();
```

To maintain the scroll position, you can use the `smoothScrollToPosition` method of the ListView. This method will smoothly scroll the ListView to the position you specify.

```java
// Scroll to the last position
listview.smoothScrollToPosition(list.size() - 1);
```

To show the notification for the new message in the title, you can update the text of the TextView in your activity.

```java
// Update the title with the new message
txt.setText(newMessage);
```

Please replace `newMessage` with the actual message you want to display in the title.

Remember to call these methods after you have added the new message to the list and notified the adapter about the data change.
